title: Solid Proto
body: During my immersive coding bootcamp experience, I collaborated with a team to develop a sophisticated project — worked under expert team of developers who leverages cutting-edge technologies like React and Django to craft bespoke web-enabled solutions for CNC machining, vacuum casting, sheet metal fabrication, injection molding, and more. With a focus on automotive, medical, electronics, aerospace, and robotics industries, our 2500m² facility and advanced machinery ensure high-quality results. Experience cost-effective solutions, expert engineering support, and seamless efficiency with fast quotes, delivery, and after-sale service. Let's discuss how our web-driven approach can elevate your projects.

title: Rewrify
description: AI-powered text generation involves using models, such as OpenAI's GPT-3, to generate coherent and contextually relevant text
body: Web application with the help of the machine learning technology helps user to transform AI generated text into human-like content

title: Air Real Estate Platform
body: A real estate website build with Reactjs / Django Rest framework, it has complete backend features which includes:-> User Registration, User Activation (process on background using celery), User Login-> Add Agents that will list properties-> List properties-> Properties detail page I have used Reactjs / HTML / CSS / Bootstrap / Redux Toolkit for frontend and Django Rest Framework for backend powered with postgresql database, containerizing the whole webapp using docker and using reverse proxies nginx to serve react/django on same IP.

title: Dopplio
body: In this project worked directly with the founder of the product, this product lets you personalize the video with generative ai solutions, i worked on the web part directly where i was given responsibility to fix ongoing issues and built new features.

title: Nutrinos
body: nutrinos is a web application designed to be a hub for best quality nutrional products.

title: MLSGRID DATA SCRAPER
description: Scraper for scraping various property data from MLS
body: The aim of this project is to scrape data from various websites like TruePeopleSearch, Minneapolis.gov, redfin , mls grid and save it in backend, we also created admin panel to track the progress as the data we get in billions, we have a proper datatable through which you can search the downloaded data, filter by date, sort it also
